CardData.Name: Not So Fast
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies for 15 damage and apply Lethargy with a 75% chance to each enemy for 2 turns. (Slows attack speed by 20%.)

CardData.Name: We Can Do It
CardData.Description: Remove one debuff from all enemies. Apply healing buff that heals for 10% of your Max HP each turn for 3 turns

CardData.Name: Hold Strong
CardData.Description: Heal the target ally for 40 HP. Draw 1 card.

CardData.Name: Icy Touch
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 20 damage. 40% chance to inflict Frostbite for 1 turn. (Freezes enemy and increases damage they take by 15%.)
